title: Dual Stigmata
description: Constantly chased by death, Ben finds himself stranded in a foreign land populated by the remnants of war. Within his shattered mind is a strangerâ€™s voice that keeps guiding him. His will to survive revolves around an unknown purpose and an ancient relic. A fateful encounter with a mysterious woman will change everything.Scarlett, a beautiful and strong soldier unexpectedly comes to his aid. Being the sole survivor, she too must stand to carry out her own mission.Only together will they stand a chance to survive and understand what it all means.Dual Stigmata is a surrealistic story about friendship, individuality, trauma and inner struggle
author: K. Austin
